description: This Java class defines a generic API response wrapper with success status, message, and data fields, including constructors, static factory methods, and getters/setters.

classes.name: ApiResponse
classes.description: A generic class for standardizing API responses with success indicator, message, and payload data.

methods.name: ok
methods.description: Creates a successful ApiResponse containing the provided data.

methods.name: fail
methods.description: Creates a failed ApiResponse with an error message.

methods.name: isSuccess
methods.description: Returns whether the API call was successful.

methods.name: getMessage
methods.description: Returns the message associated with the API response.

methods.name: getData
methods.description: Returns the data payload of the response.

methods.name: setSuccess
methods.description: Sets the success status of the response.

methods.name: setMessage
methods.description: Sets the message of the response.

methods.name: setData
methods.description: Sets the data payload of the response.
